mapper.insert: insert into DepositBase (comNum, prdNum, comName, prdName, interest, spclCnd, maxLimit, joinMember) values (#{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{comName}, #{prdName}, #{interest}, #{spclCnd}, #{maxLimit}, #{joinMember})
insert into DepositOption (comNum, prdNum, intrRate, intrRate2, saveTrm, intrRateTypeName) values (#{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{intrRate}, #{intrRate2}, #{saveTrm}, #{intrRateTypeName})
